alert.note: Alert for Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:10PM MST until July 17 at 2:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MST FOR CENTRAL SANTA CRUZ COUNTY... At 210 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Patagonia Lake State Park, or 12 miles east of Tubac, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nogales, Tubac, Rio Rico, Patagonia, Nogales International Airport, Patagonia Lake State Park, Tumacacori, Amado, Kino Springs and Madera Canyon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
